room_title: Escape room "1408 Escape" by Brighton Asylum in New York
review: The staff was amazing and extremely courteous! We went to Brighton to try and escape room 1408 for our anniversary and we're not disappointed! We couldn't ask for a better experience and I commend the team for all that they do.

room_title: Escape room "1408 Escape" by Brighton Asylum in New York
review: We came back for the 1408 escape room and it definitely did not disappoint. John Anthony is the GM and he was the one who hosted our game. He was absolutely hilarious and very chill. They can take up to 7 people here but I think it would get pretty crowded. I would stick with 5 people max to really enjoy it. This is definitely a place you shouldn't miss out on. They update the rooms from time to time with new puzzles, so I wouldn't mind going again.

room_title: Escape room "1408 Escape" by Brighton Asylum in New York
review: We tried the 1408 escape room last night which was AWESOME. It was thrilling, intense and definitely made you thin outside the box. The staff is super friendly and accommodating. I highly recommend this place!

room_title: Escape room "1408 Escape" by Brighton Asylum in New York
review: The 1408 escape room has a lot of potential if they would make it more challenging, interactive and creative. I did enjoy its aesthetic, which spooked me out.

room_title: Escape room "1408 Escape" by Brighton Asylum in New York
review: Went there with a few friends last night and had an absolute blast! The haunt was insane and the escape rooms were the icing on the cake. Highly recommended!
